title: Aiythaaney Lyrics Muthal Idam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: D Imman, Chinmayi
Song: Aiythaaney
Lyrics: Yugabharathi
Music Director : D Imman
Movie: Muthal Idam

Aiythaaney Aiythaaney Kooru
Unnulle Unnule yaaru ....
Aiythaaney Aiythaaney Kooru
Unnulle Unnulle yaaru ...

ketkaathe idhupola maane maane
Ne endru solvene naane naane
Sollamale pogathe thooram thooram
Sonnalume ketkaathe kadhal bootham
Sarithaane innum innum enna solla

Ohh ..Ethanayo azhagaana pennilavu irundhaalum
Un idhayam naanaaga enna kaaranam
kattalagil uruvaagum kaadhal veru
Unn vida magaraasi ooril yaaru
Thara naanum bayanthaale
Vandhu neeyum mutham ketpiya
Adi podi mutham illa motham thaeva ...

Aiythaaney Aiythaaney Kooru
Unnulle Unnule yaaru ....
ketkaathe idhupola maane maane
Ne endru solvene naane naane

Ohh.. ennudaya ninaivaaga eppozhudhum irupaaya
vandhu unna sernthaale maari poviya
ingithame theriyaatha pecha maathu
Unna vitta kidayaathu moochu kaathu
Vayadhaagividum podhu enn ne thalli poviya
En uyir neeye, thalli poana sethu pogum

ketkaathe idhupola maane maane
Ne endre solvene naane naane
Sollamale pogathe thooram thooram
Sonnalume ketkaathe kadhal bootham
Sarithaane innum innum enna solla
